titles.title: Community Fire Safety Act of 2013
To amend the Safe Drinking Water Act to exempt fire hydrants from the prohibition on the use of lead pipes, fittings, fixtures, solder, and flux.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment and the Economy.

bill.summary: 11/19/2013--Introduced. Community Fire Safety Act of 2013 - Amends the Safe Drinking Water Act to exempt fire hydrants from certain prohibitions against the use of lead pipes, solder, and flux.
